oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mr. Wallis, Ms. Harriet Fuller, and Mr. William F. Murrah
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Wallis, C. Lamar; Murrah, William F.; Fuller, Harriet; Cherokee Branch; buildings; libraries; 1970s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Note on back: "Dedication of Cherokee Branch Library, a $224,000 facility, was held on April 6, 1975. The 10,000 square foot building contains 15,000 books for all ages plus phonography records, cassettes, periodicals, newspapers and a meeting room for community use. In the photo, from left to right, are Ms. Harriett Fuller, Head Librarian; Lamar Wallis, Library Director and William F. Murrah, Chairman, Board of Trustees."
